definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: When you read a poem, you've got to try to read it as a series of sentences.
sentences.chinese: 讀一首詩的時，你要試著把它讀成一連串的句子。

sentences.english: Try reading out loud the following famous poem by A. E. Housman.
sentences.chinese: 試著把下面這首霍斯曼所寫的著名詩作大聲讀出來。

sentences.english: Try to harvest the fruit before first frost.
sentences.chinese: 試著在初霜之前採摘水果。

sentences.english: I've always tried to go a step past wherever people expected me to end up.
sentences.chinese: 我一直都是當人們期待我停止的地方試著跨越一步。

sentences.english: Did you try to have an OBE?
You can try to use following methods to solve the contradictories in work.
sentences.chinese: 妳可以試著利用下面的方法來解決職場矛盾。

sentences.english: If the later was the case, may be I tried to use both oars.
sentences.chinese: 如果是後面的情況，那我可能就是試著使用兩根槳。

sentences.english: When capturing a control point, try to defend the entrances with stickies.
sentences.chinese: 當你正在佔領據點時，試著丟一些黏彈到據點入口處。

sentences.english: He has tried coming at the feeder from every direction but without success.
sentences.chinese: 於是牠試著從各種角度去搆喂鳥盆，但都無法成功。

sentences.english: Try to interact with your audience during your speech.
sentences.chinese: 演講時試著和你的聽衆互動看看。

sentences.english: The conqueror tried to make the natives abjure their religion.
sentences.chinese: 征服者試著讓當地人宣誓放棄他們的宗教。

sentences.english: What place is this? I should try to make it clear.
sentences.chinese: 這是那裏？我要試著摸清楚它。

sentences.english: If you try to incorporate everyone in the field in someway.
sentences.chinese: 如果你試著融入在場上的所有人。

sentences.english: And you'll fine happiness without an end. Whenever you pretend.
sentences.chinese: 當你開始試著假裝你很快樂，快樂將永無止盡。

sentences.english: Listen to me carefully, and try to remember what Isay.
sentences.chinese: 仔細聽我說，試著記住我說的話。

sentences.english: The baby-sitter tried to ignore the children's shouting.
sentences.chinese: 這個保母試著不去理睬孩子們的喊叫。

definition: to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
to be capable of/to be able to/can
conversely/in reverse order/in an opposite direction
